talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:SurpriseL_01>Pardon me for not noticing you. <sp:5:0:0>I was
absorbed in preparing my next meal.<sp:0:4:0>Hmm. <sp:5:0:0>I do not recall having seen you
before today. <sp:5:0:0>I must doubly apologize
for my inattentiveness.<sp:0:4:0>It is the duty of a construct to field any
questions that those such as yourself
may have.<sp:0:4:0>You may pose these questions to any
construct. <sp:5:0:0>We will answer them as best
we can.<sp:0:4:0>Are you interested in my <clr:0000>cooking<clr:ffff>?
talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive><clr:0000>Meals<clr:ffff> will heal your body. They may have
other effects as well. <sp:5:0:0>Do not be alarmed
when this happens.
talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Happy_00>Ah! You seem to be uneducated when it
comes to <clr:0000>cooking<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Very well. <sp:5:0:0>You will learn how to create a
meal on your own.
talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Yes. Cooking. <sp:5:0:0>I will educate you
thoroughly. We will start with the basics.
talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:LaughS_01>Oh dear. <sp:5:1:0>It is already late. I was too
absorbed in cooking to notice.<sp:0:4:0>I will rest until the next time bell.<sp:5:1:0>
Do not let that dissuade you if you
have questions.
talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Our creators <clr:0000>cooked<clr:ffff> to restore
themselves. <sp:5:0:0>They crafted elixirs to
better themselves.<sp:0:4:0>It is a fundamental rite of life. <sp:5:0:0>I can
educate you further if you want.
talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive><clr:0000>Cooking <clr:ffff>step one. Hold the ingredients in
your arms. Step two. Throw them into a
<clr:0000>pot over a lit fire<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>Cooking complete.<sp:0:4:0>That is the simple version. The world of
<clr:0000>cooking<clr:ffff> can be as complex as you want.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>There are many possible dishes. <sp:5:0:0>What you
make and what <clr:0000>effect<clr:ffff> you gain depends
on the ingredients used.<sp:0:4:0>Some meals are <clr:0000>warming<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>Others may
replenish <clr:0000>stamina<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Tiny organisms known as "critters" and
monster parts are not food. <sp:5:0:0>Save them as
the base for <clr:0000>elixirs<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:QuestionNormal>This information was provided by our
creators. But I cannot eat. So take it with
a grain of salt. <sp:5:1:0>Food joke.<sp:0:4:0>I will remain stationed here. <sp:5:0:0>Ask me
anytime you have further questions
about cooking.
talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>You may want to experiment for yourself.
That is the purpose of the pot nearby.
talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>Well. <sp:5:0:0>Look who is here to be educated
about <clr:0000>cooking<clr:ffff>.
talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>I have explained all I can. <sp:5:1:0>I could repeat
it if you want.
talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>There is a pot nearby. <sp:5:1:0>It is there for your
use in cooking.
talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseS_00>Welcome back. <sp:5:0:0>Have you learned what
you can on making <clr:0000>meals <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>elixirs<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>Both consumables can bestow a variety
of <clr:0000>effects<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>I am here to provide answers
to any questions you might have.
talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hold the ingredients in your arms. Dump
those ingredients into a <clr:0000>pot over a lit fire<clr:ffff>.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0>There are no further steps. There are
many potential ingredient combinations.
Enjoy cooking.
talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Throw tiny organisms known as "<clr:0000>critters<clr:ffff>"
and <clr:0000>monster<clr:ffff> parts into a pot. The process
is the same. Only the materials differ.<sp:0:4:0>Do not mix them with cooking ingredients.
The results are unappetizing.
talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Have you learned what you can on making
<clr:0000>meals <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>elixirs<clr:ffff>?<sp:0:4:0>Both consumables can bestow a variety
of <clr:0000>effects<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>I am here to provide answers
to any questions you might have.
talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>Some results are <clr:0000>warming<clr:ffff>. Others may
replenish <clr:0000>stamina<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>What effect you gain
will depend on the ingredients.<sp:0:4:0>The <clr:0000>restless crickets<clr:ffff> hopping around here
restore vigor when used in elixirs. <clr:0000><sp:5:1:0><clr:ffff>This is
one example. There are many others.<sp:0:4:0>The name often expresses the nature.
talk_00: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Tired_00>My next batch will also be tasty.
